description: Ready in a flash, this fresh twist on the classic Waldorf salad featuring blueberries and nectarines is just what your barbecue spread needs.
name: Summer Waldorf Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange leafy mix, celery, peach wedges, blueberries and walnuts on a platter. Drizzle over dressing. Serve seasoned with pepper.
